priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Rhythm Device Failure Manifestation Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C101866

self.title: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Rhythm Device Failure Manifestation Terminology

definition: The effect that a cardiac rhythm device malfunction had on the ability to stimulate the heart.
name: Cardiac Rhythm Device Failure Manifestation
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Cardiac Rhythm Device Failure Manifestation Terminology

terms.definition: The cardiac rhythm device malfunction affected atrial pacing.
The cardiac rhythm device malfunction affected the defibrillator.
The cardiac rhythm device malfunction affected the left ventricular (LV) pacing.
The cardiac rhythm device malfunction affected the right ventricular (RV) pacing.
